org.treetank.api

Interface INodeWriteTrx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    INodeReadTrx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeWriteTrx

    public interface INodeWriteTrx
extends INodeReadTrx

    INodeWriteTrx

    Description

    Interface to access nodes based on the Key/ParentKey/FirstChildKey/LeftSiblingKey/RightSiblingKey/ChildCount encoding. This encoding keeps the children ordered but has no knowledge of the global node ordering. The underlying tree is accessed in a cursor-like fashion.

      • insertElementAsFirstChild

        long insertElementAsFirstChild(QName pName)
                               throws TTException
        Insert new element node as first child of currently selected node. The cursor is moved to the inserted node.
        Parameters:
        pName - QName of node to insert
        Returns:
        key of inserted node
        Throws:
        TTException - if element node couldn't be inserted as first child

      • insertTextAsFirstChild

        long insertTextAsFirstChild(String pValue)
                            throws TTException
        Insert new text node as first child of currently selected node. The cursor is moved to the inserted node.
        Parameters:
        pValue - value of node to insert
        Returns:
        Key of inserted node. Already has a first child.
        Throws:
        TTException - if text node couldn't be inserted as first child.

      • insertElementAsRightSibling

        long insertElementAsRightSibling(QName pFromKey)
                                 throws TTException
        Insert new element node as right sibling of currently selected node. The cursor is moved to the inserted node.
        Parameters:
        pFromKey - QName of the new node
        Returns:
        Key of inserted node. Already has a first child.
        Throws:
        TTException - if element node couldn't be inserted as right sibling

      • insertTextAsRightSibling

        long insertTextAsRightSibling(String pValue)
                              throws TTException
        Insert new text node as right sibling of currently selected node. The cursor is moved to the inserted node.
        Parameters:
        pValue - value of node to insert
        Returns:
        Key of inserted node. the root node which is not allowed to have right siblings.
        Throws:
        TTException - if text node couldn't be inserted as right sibling

      • remove

        void remove()
            throws TTException
        Remove currently selected node. This does automatically remove descendants. The cursor is located at the former right sibling. If there was no right sibling, it is located at the former left sibling. If there was no left sibling, it is located at the former parent.
        Throws:
        TTException - if node couldn't be removed

      • commit

        void commit()
            throws TTException
        CommitStrategy all modifications of the exclusive write transaction. Even commit if there are no modification at all.
        Throws:
        TTException - if this revision couldn't be commited

        Throws:

      • revertTo

        void revertTo(long pRev)
              throws TTException
        Reverting all changes to the revision defined. This command has to be finalized with a commit.
        Parameters:
        pRev - revert to the revision
        Throws:
        TTException - if couldn't revert to revision
